items.title: Mountain Pose (Tadasana)
items.description: Stand tall with feet together, arms at sides. Ground through your feet and lengthen through the crown of your head.

items.title: Downward Dog (Adho Mukha Svanasana)
items.description: Form an inverted V-shape with your body, hands and feet on the ground, hips lifted high.

items.title: Tree Pose (Vrksasana)
items.description: Balance on one leg with the other foot placed on inner thigh, hands in prayer position or overhead.

items.title: Warrior I (Virabhadrasana I)
items.description: Lunge position with front knee bent, back leg straight, arms extended overhead.
benefits: Builds strength in legs and core

items.title: Child's Pose (Balasana)
items.description: Kneel and sit back on heels, fold forward with arms extended, forehead resting on the ground.
benefits: Calms the mind and relieves stress

items.title: Cobra Pose (Bhujangasana)
items.description: Lie face down, press through hands to lift chest, keeping hips on the ground.

items.title: 1. Commencing Form
items.description: Begin with feet together, arms hanging naturally. Slowly raise arms to shoulder height, then lower while bending knees.
benefits: Calms the mind and centers energy

items.title: 2. Part the Wild Horse's Mane
items.description: Step with alternating legs while moving arms in a circular motion, as if parting a horse's mane.

items.title: 3. White Crane Spreads Wings
items.description: Shift weight to one leg while raising opposite arm high and lowering the other, mimicking a crane.

items.title: 4. Brush Knee and Twist Step
items.description: Step forward while brushing hand past knee in a circular motion and pushing opposite palm forward.

items.title: 5. Playing the Pipa
items.description: Shift weight back while bringing hands together in front of body, like holding a Chinese lute.

items.title: 6. Reverse Reeling Forearm
items.description: Step back while circling arms in a rolling motion, alternating sides.

items.title: 7. Left Grasp Bird's Tail
items.description: Circular movement incorporating ward off, roll back, press, and push on the left side.

items.title: 8. Right Grasp Bird's Tail
items.description: Same as movement 7, performed on the right side.

items.title: Bear Crawl
items.description: Move on hands and feet with hips high, opposite hand and foot moving together in a coordinated pattern.

items.title: Lizard Crawl
items.description: Low to the ground movement with belly close to floor, moving laterally with cross-body coordination.

items.title: Crab Walk
items.description: Seated position with hands behind and feet in front, lift hips and walk backwards or sideways.

items.title: Monkey Movement
items.description: Deep squat position moving in various directions, hands touching ground for support and balance.

items.title: Frog Jump
items.description: From a deep squat, explosively jump forward, landing softly back into squat position.

items.title: Cat Balance
items.description: Moving on hands and feet with controlled, precise movements, focusing on balance and flow.

items.title: Scorpion Reach
items.description: From hands and feet position, extend one leg high while reaching opposite hand forward.

items.title: Wolf Prowl
items.description: Quadrupedal movement with focused, stalking-like quality, emphasizing control and precision.
